title: Gold 3 Support Looking For Someone Who Also Wants To Get Plat
body:
Im a support main who wants to get plat by the next days im willing to commit my 100% but i want someone else who gives its 100%

ADD ME

IGN: CLG Mata

replies.body: top main g1 getting to plat 2 ign Sisters10086
